code: import _ from"lodash";export function getSum(transaction,type){var sum=_(transaction).groupBy("type").map(function(obj,key){if(!type)return _.sumBy(obj,"amount");return{type:key,color:obj[0].color,total:_.sumBy(obj,"amount")};}).value();return sum;}export function getLabels(transaction){var amountSum=getSum(transaction,"type");var Total=_.sum(getSum(transaction));var percent=_(amountSum).map(function(objs){return _.assign(objs,{percent:100*objs.total/Total});}).value();return percent;}export function chartData(transaction,custom){var bg=_.map(transaction,function(a){return a.color;});bg=_.uniq(bg);console.log(bg);var dataValue=getSum(transaction);var config={data:{datasets:[{data:[300,50,100],backgroundColor:bg,hoverOffset:4,borderRadius:30,spacing:10}]},options:{cutout:115}};return custom!==null&&custom!==void 0?custom:config;}export function getTotal(transaction){return _.sum(getSum(transaction));}
